articles.title: PlayStation 6 & PlayStation Handheld Specs Leaked – Rasterization Performance Estimated to be 3X and 0.5X of PS5, Respectively - Wccftech
articles.description: YouTuber Moore's Law Is Dead has leaked the specifications of the PlayStation 6 and PlayStation handheld consoles from a 2023 presentation.
articles.content: Following Monday's report on the PlayStation 6 and PlayStation handheld codenames (Orion and Canis), YouTube Moore's Law Is Dead (MLID) has now shared specs for both upcoming consoles from a leaked 2… [+3485 chars]
